price: Dan Kami turunkan air dari langit menurut suatu ukuran, lalu Kami jadikan air itu menetap di bumi dan sesungguhnya Kami benar-benar berkuasa menghilangkannya.
arabic: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَسۡكَنَّٰهُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابِۭ بِهِۦ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-askannāhu fī al-arḍi wa-innā ʿalā dhahābin bihi laqādirūna
translations: then We cause it to settle
